item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Do not read, as children do, to amuse yourself, or like the ambitious, for the purpose of instruction. No, read in order to live." -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Salim A. Fillah
item.description: "Kekhawatiran tak menjadikan bahayanya membesar Hanya dirimu yang mengerdil Tenanglah, semata karena Allah bersamamu Maka tugasmu hanya berikhtiar Dan di sana pahala surga menantimu" -- Salim A. Fillah

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Salim A. Fillah
item.description:
"Kita kadang merasa lebih benar, lebih baik, lebih tinggi, dan lebih suci dibanding mereka yang kita nasehati.
Hanya mengingatkan kembali kepada diri ini: jika kau merasa besar, periksa hatimu. Mungkin ia sedang bengkak.
Jika kau merasa suci, periksa jiwamu. Mungkin itu putihnya nanah dari luka nurani.
Jika kau merasa tinggi, periksa batinmu. Mungkin ia sedang melayang kehilangan pajakan.
Jika kau merasa wangi, priksa ikhlasmu, mungkin itu asap dari amal shalihmu YANG HANGUS DIBAKAR RIYA'." -- Salim A. Fillah

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "What is right is not always popular and what is popular is not always right." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has ever been before." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reading, after a certain age, diverts the mind too much from its creative pursuits. Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Somebody who only reads newspapers and at best books of contemporary authors looks to me like an extremely near-sighted person who scorns eyeglasses. He is completely dependent on the prejudices and fashions of his times, since he never gets to see or hear anything else." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description:
"Student: Dr. Einstein, Aren't these the same questions as last year's [physics] final exam?
Dr. Einstein: Yes; But this year the answers are different." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A man should look for what is, and not for what he thinks should be." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Teaching should be such that what is offered is perceived as a valuable gift and not as hard duty. Never regard study as duty but as the enviable opportunity to learn to know the liberating influence of beauty in the realm of the spirit for your own personal joy and to the profit of the community to which your later work belongs." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Student is not a container you have to fill but a torch you have to light up." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "It is harder to crack prejudice than an atom." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "It would be my greatest sadness to see Zionists (Jews) do to Palestinian Arabs much of what Nazis did to Jews." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Einstein
item.description: "Intelligence is not the ability to store information, but to know where to find it." -- Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There is nothing known as "Perfect". Its only those imperfections which we choose not to see!!" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I do not teach anyone I only provide the environment in which they can learn" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Einstein
item.description: "Einstein was once asked how many feet are in a mile. Einstein's reply was "I don't know, why should I fill my brain with facts I can find in two minutes in any standard reference book?" -- Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I don't pretend to understand the universe — it's much bigger than I am." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "You do not really understand something unless you can explain it to your grandmother." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The person who reads too much and uses his brain too little will fall into lazy habits of thinking.." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The man with the greatest soul will always face the greatest war with the low minded person." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I never teach my pupils, I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Adversity introduces a man to himself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Failing isn't bad when you learn what not to do." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: itsumoAoi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Bear in mind that the wonderful things you learn in your schools are the work of many generations. All this is put in your hands as your inheritance in order that you may receive it, honor it, add to it, and one day faithfully hand it on to your children." -- Albert Einstein
